name: Denario (AstroPilot-AI)
description: [项目级] Modular Multi-Agent System for Scientific Research Assistance。来源: https://github.com/AstroPilot-AI/Denario

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Modular Multi-Agent System for Scientific Research Assistance

来源: https://github.com/AstroPilot-AI/Denario
语言: TeX
Stars: 498

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
python -m venv Denario_env
source Denario_env/bin/activate
pip install "denario[app]"

name: Denario/docker 模块
description: [模块级] Denario 项目的 docker 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/AstroPilot-AI/Denario

genes.title: docker 模块说明
genes.content:
You can run Denario in a [Docker](https://www.docker.com/) image, which includes all the required dependencies for Denario including LaTeX. Pull the image with:

```bash
docker pull pablovd/denario:latest
```

Once built, you can run the GUI with

```bash
docker run -p 8501:8501 --rm pablovd/denario:latest
```

or in interactive mode with

```bash
docker run --rm -it pablovd/denario:latest bash
```
